# Luminous Echo

*Generated on 2025-08-20 23:35:24 UTC*
*Style: Limerick*
*Theme: Stars*
*Seed: 1755732924634656878-18189*

---

A star shone with radiant delight,
Its echo stretched far through the night,
With luminous grace,
It brightened all space,
And whispered of infinite light.

---
